input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product name.

Product name:
Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts,Royal,3XL

Product keywords:
100% polyester
two side pockets
zippered pocket on the back right
Brushed waistband with draw cord
Dri-FIT circular knit body fabric
Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg
9.25 inseam (Size Medium)

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Our state-of-the-art Canon BP-718 compatible battery is designed and manufactured under strict European ISO 9001 standards. It meets and exceeds high priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price! This includes two Compatible Digital Batteries and one Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch (15x24 cm). Protective Retail Packaging, with each product wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. 

Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727 are also compatible and may have different capacities that would impact the size of the battery.

18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
input_text.Response B: Look fly when you hit the field wearing these Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts from Nike. These Dri-FIT shorts have two side pockets with a zippered pocket on the back right. The brushed waistband has a drawcord. These are made from 100% polyester. The Nike Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg.

label_annotations.factors_a: Had absolutely nothing to do with the prompt at all. No information about Nike shorts were given whatsoever. It would be a great response for the item it is talking about.
label_annotations.factors_b: Gave little bits of it's own ideas and used facts from the prompt too. Could have added a bit more of the information it was given, hence the 4 star rating for the response. It felt very basic.
